inn1.comm: full and swinging straight away, that landed outside off and shaped away, Simmons' forward movement with the front pad was too extravagant and he had to check it before guiding to point.
swing again, this time from much wider outside off. Not too much carry on that ball, though, as Simmons leaves.
he sprays this one miles down the leg side.
better length and line, keeps it just outside off and gets the away swing again. Simmons leaves.
back of a length, curls away slightly off the straight, but it dies on Parthiv as Simmons shoulders arms.
Simmons gets across to cover the line and punches to mid-on.
and finishes with another gentle outswinger, as Simmons leaves thoughtfully.
bangs his first ball in short and wide, and Barath jumps back and punches through the covers. Lovely stroke, and it runs past Raina's dive in the covers for a couple.
shape for Umesh now, full and angling in towards middle and leg before straightening, and Barath defends from the crease.

emphatic! Barath smashes the first four of the day with a free-spirited carve behind point. Umesh drops short and affords enough pace and width for that shot, Barath latches on with a flourish off the back foot.
goes full now, attacks the pads, and Barath defends from the crease. He was late coming down on that ...
drifts onto the pads, Barath skips inside the line and tucks it to square leg for a single.
short of a length, Simmons hangs back and defends down the track.
that's his operating length, short of driving distance and wobbling away. Barath covers the line and defends.
cut away, but a diving save at point. This Indian ODI side fields as well as the Test side fields poorly. Jadeja dives away to the right and stops a  boundary.

not in control of the pull, but at Vinay's pace he gets away with it. This was short but well wide of off stump for the pull. Barath went for the stroke, and the bat face was pointing upwayds when he connected with it, but managed to drag it over midwicket.
gets another couple away as Vinay drifts onto middle and leg. Barath works it behind square.

Barath is going for everything here! Vinay moves this away off the seam, Barath stays on the crease and lashes at it with hard hands, and gets a thick edge that flies wide of the lone slip, and beats third man too.
Vinay ends with a slightly fuller length, gets Barath to lean forward to defend to the off side.
Yadav angles in from a length, good pace on that ball as Simmons hangs back and defends.

beaten outside off by a McGrathesque sliver of movement away from a length outside off. The pace on that ball was beyond McGrathesque, though. Simmons was late to get his exaggerated trigger movement going into the shot.
hops onto the back foot and defends another pacy ball towards the covers. Simmons is still on 0.
Make that 0 off 11 balls. Umesh allows him to drive now, full outside off, but Simmons can't pierce the covers.
keeps him back on the crease, Simmons opens the face and plays it into the covers.
maiden for Umesh, ends the over with another searching ball on a length outside off, getting Simmons to reach out for the defensive push.
cramps him for room with a length ball that comes in with the line, and Barath defends from the crease.

what an absolute beaut of a delivery! No pace on that, it didn't have to be fast. It just kept coming in out of his hand, but after landing back of a length, it just kept going away. Barath was on the back foot, and got squared up as he kept moving the bat to the right in search of the ball, but all he got was a thin outside edge through to Parthiv. Tony Hill takes his time, but gets the decision right.
back of a length and angling in, Samuels stays on the back foot as always and defends.
jittery but safe .. Samuels gets a length ball wide of off stump and he stayed stationary on the leg stump line and drove uppishly away from the body. The thick edge flew safely through gully.
Simmons is moving into these check-drives with a flourish, but that's not really helping. Puched off the middle of the bat to mid-on.
looks for the single after guiding this length ball to point, but Jadeja puts paid to such hopes. Simmons is still on 0.
short and quick outside off stump, Samuels doesn't get across but times the square punch well. Point gets in the way.
Samuels stays well deep in the crease and looks to crash a short ball, but it isn't wide enough for him to really pack some humpty. Mistimed into the covers.

strange shot-selection again, but he gets the boundary now. Umesh goes full on the middle and leg line, Samuels has a very open stance and lunges into the push drive past point, and it is through for four.
his right foot is on leg stump, and his left foot halfway to square leg, but he gets both behind a defensive stroke as Umesh attacks the stumps.
drifts onto the pads now, and provides Samuels enough pace to skip inside the line and glance it away to fine leg for four.
now Samuels leaps across his stumps, it is a long jump for him, and lets a short ball go through to the keeper.
Simmons opens his account finally, with a murderously well-timed thump down the ground. It wasn't over-pitched, and he was driving on the up but middled it perfectly. It just flew right past Vinay.
even better. Simmons skips out, gets inside the line as Vinay angles into the pads, and Simmons hoists it majestically over midwicket. The ball lands on the rope on the full.
goes with hard hands at a square push-drive and picks up another single.
good length to Samuels, it cuts in a touch too and Samuels defends from the crease.
width outside off, Samuels doesn't get across and just flays at it, and the thick outside edge runs away backward of point.
angling in to end the over, Simmons hangs on the crease and whips it through midwicket for a single. Two good overs there for WI.

Simmons is beaten for pace by Umesh, not quite the same thing as facing Vinay this. Short ball clocked higher than 145 kph and he goes for a pull, but the ball buzzes past him before he plays the stroke, under the bat and over the stumps.
another super fast ball, inside edged but safe. Full from Umesh, Simmons backs away and looks to guide it square, but the ball takes the edge and flies perilously close to the stumps.
gets behind the line and defends a length ball.
short ball, late on the pull now. This is exciting stuff.
goes very full now, Simmons jams the bat down on it and edges it onto the turf and towards Parthiv. This is blisteringly quick!
Simmons stays back and looks to go up and over the off side as Umesh bangs this in short. The ball takes off from a length and he gets a top edge, that just clears point as he runs back.

timber! Samuels ends up looking as clumsy as humpty dumpty. Aaron gets his natural inward shape from a length. Samuels is stuck with the most curious stance since Chanderpaul, and just lunges forward to feel for it. One leg is in Cuttack, the other in Bhubaneshwar and the bat somewhere in between. He is beaten by the inward movement, the ball hits the back pad and disturbs leg stump. Might have been saved if the stance wasn't so open. Or so weird.
slips the first ball down the leg side.
a wicket followed by two wides. This one slips even wider down the leg side.
Bravo is away, gets width outside off and steers a single through the covers.
back of a length outside off, not a lot of carry as Simmons leaves.
Simmons gets forward and guides a length ball to point.
full toss on the pads, clipped straight to midwicket. And Kohli throws needlessly to concede the overthrow.
appeal for lbw, but it is sliding down the leg side for sure. Bravo gets a leg bye into the off side.
full length on the pads from over the stumps, Bravo leans out and defends cautiously.
short of a length and enough pace outside off to allow Bravo a steer through point. No single taken, though.
opens the face again and defends to the off side with an opened face once more.
too straight this time, allows Bravo to nudges it round the corner for a single.
pushes him back with the pace, Simmons hangs back and pushes it into the covers.

life is fair. Umesh, easily the best bowler so far today, has a wicket. Simmons never really came to grips with his pace. Another one blasts its way through an apologetically late attempt at a cut. The ball blitzed in, took the inside edge and made a mess of the furniture.
back of a length outside off, defended from the crease. Bravo seems to have an extra instant at hand to deal with the pace.
opens the face this time and guides a single through point.
a Simmons-like flourish as he hops onto the back foot and defends towards point.
full and tempting outside off, Hyatt lets the ball go through to the keeper.
too much width outside off, and Hyatt cashes in with a fluent drive through the covers that he did well to keep down. Pierces the cover field and the ball buzzes along for four.
back of a length outside off, Bravo opens the face and defends to the off side.
keeps him pressed on the back foot with the length, and Bravo defends to the off side.
straighter ball this time, Bravo is reluctant to get forward and pushes carefully to mid-off.
a hint of seam movement away from off stump, Bravo gets squared up on the crease and edges through point.
Vinay nips this in from wide of off stump, and Hyatt shoulders arms. Hits him well outside off, so he gets away with it.
over-pitched and driven well, but Ashwin at mid-on lunges across to cut off four.
short and fast, angling in and cramping Bravo who still goes for the pull. He's in no position and mistimes it to wide mid-on.
Bravo stays back and pushes a length ball towards point.
angled into the pads, and Bravo's fluid timing comes into play. Worked off the pads through square leg for a couple.
back of a length outside off, Bravo drives on the up but mistimes it towards point.
on the pads at 145 kph, Bravo nudges it round the corner towards fine leg for a single.
Hyatt shoulders arms outside off as Aaron bustles through on a length.
133 kph from Vinay, on the pads and tucked away resolutely for another single. The floodlights are coming on early in east India.
short of a length and wide of off stump, Hyatt goes for a big heave and misses.
ooh, he nips this one in surreptitiously off the seam and Hyatt again leaves ... That wasn't far from off stump.
gets back and across to defends to the off side.
Vinay plugs away back of a length, and Hyatt forces it off the back foot towards mid off.
Vinay ends the over with an unplayable cobra of a delivery. It comes in harmlessly and then slips away like a seductress, leaving Hyatt fumbling away in its wake as he tries to cover the line.
spin straight away for the hero of the Test series. Lands on leg and breaks away, Bravo covers the deviation well and guides to the off side.
flatter and faster on off stump, Bravo pushes it into the mid-off area.
width outside off, Bravo backs away and cuts to deep point for a single.
turning in from outside off, Hyatt carefully covers the line and defends.
this one turns onto the pads, worked with the angle towards midwicket.
beautiful ball. Tossed up, but it dips alarmingly on Bravo after sucking him forward and he ends up swishing at it in hope. The ball spins past the edge. Drinks in Cuttack.
he continues to maintain good lengths outside off and Hyatt hops across to shoulder arms.
another leave outside off, the ball dies on Parthi who fumbles as he collects and it jumps up to hit the face. Babyface at that. Ouch.
Hyatt heaves away with hard hands as Aaron rolls his fingers on a legcutter that goes marginally away. Played away behind point for a single.

Bravura from Bravo! Short and fast ball angling in outside off, and Bravo unleashes a carve of Lara-esque proportions. The bat swing ended at midwicket, and gave the ball a fair tonk on the way, that took it almost all the way over the covers.
Aaron tries too hard to cut the room and slips this one down the leg side.
another wide down the leg side. Ragged from Aaron, he doesn't seem to like bowling round the stumps.
on the stumps now, and Bravo pushes to mid-on for a single.
Hyatt unleashes an almighty hoick outside off and misses a short wide ball.
turning away from short of a length, Bravo guides to the off side.
short ball, Bravo goes back and wrist-whips through midwicket for one.
the carrom ball, lands on middle and straightens, Hyatt manages to defend it off the front foot.
this one turns down the leg side and Hyatt helps it along to fine leg.
another straighter one tossed up on the stumps and Hyatt defends off the front foot.
tossed up generously, Hyatt leans out to block it.
144 kph, full and fast from Aaron, who has toes in his eyes. Bravo is stuck on the back foot and plays all around it, but the ball was slipping down the leg when it struck him.
145 kph, another full ball outside off and Bravo jams down on it and gets a thick outside edge that hurtles past Parthiv to the third man fence.
packs a fair thump on this one, fast delivery on a length and it is punched to cover, but finds the fielder.

142 kph, and Bravo sends it past cover at 284 kph at least. A smouldering cover drive to deal with the pace and show Aaron who is the boss. Deep point didn't have a chance to stop that once it found the gap in the infield.
another flowing smash through the covers, but this time he picks out the man inside the circle. Bravo is looking the part here.
short of a length to end the over, Bravo adjusts and defends even as it straightens.
loopy ball on off stump, Hyatt defends to the leg side.
he skips out of the crease and defends to the leg side with the turn.
carrom ball now, Hyatt was on the front foot and defended it confidently.
on the pads, and whipped with the turn to a tumbling Kohli at midwicket.
keeps it on the middle and leg line and Hyatt again turns it around to the leg side.
maiden from Ashwin, as the third successive ball is played with the turn to Kohli in the circle at midwicket.
inside edge, but safe. Bravo pushes away from the body with awry balance as Aaron angles in, and the ball squeezes away through square leg.
back of a length outside off, Bravo adjusts and opens the face to play it to point.
quick and angled in from round the stumps, Bravo doesn't have room but manages to time the steer well enough for a single through point.
beaten outside off. Hyatt has his feet firmly plastered to the turf as he plays a cut. Beaten for pace, comprehensively.
fuller now, allows Hyatt to thump the drive with good timing. He finds point, though.
timed even better, but dead straight to Raina who takes the missile without flinching, even as he falls back to cushion the impact.
close, but safe again. Tossed up outside off, Bravo tries an ambitious whip against the turn and plays it onto his pad.

drops a return catch! That ball stopped, gripped and broke away sharply to have Bravo in a mess. He ended up pushing it hard and high, a couple of feet over Ashwin at catchable height, but he can't latch on with the leap to his right.
full ball, Hyatt stays circumspect and defends.
tossed up outside off, played back to the bowler.
gets the single at long last, driving with the turn through mid-on for a single.
angled in and straightening, Hyatt defends down the track.
tight line, defended onto the pad.
Hyatt reaches 10 for the second time in his career. Pushes with the turn into the covers to reach double figures.
tossed up on the stumps, and Bravo drives it past the bowler for a single.
now that he's reached his landmark, Hyatt is taking on the bowlers. He skips out, gets to the flight and smashes Jadeja all the way over long-on. Super shot.
stays on the crease for the final ball and defends down the track.
tossed up, dipping and turning away, Bravo cuts straight to Jadeja at cover.
pushed through flatter, Bravo pushes to point for a quick single and Kohli nearly concedes another needless overthrow.
drifts this one across Hyatt, and it takes the outside edge to point. Aaron's turn to hurl wildly at the stumps, and the Windies get an overthrow.
the straighter one on middle and holding its line, defended from the crease.
smashed! The hotelier is having a party now. Flighted into his zone outside off, and Hyatt veritably smashes it back past the bowler for four.
slipping down the leg side, Bravo looks to cross-bat the sweep but can't get it away.
works a single now, with the turn through midwicket.
Hyatt's turn to get the single, through midwicket now.
tossed up outside off, Bravo leans into a powerful drive, but finds cover.
short ball now, Bravo heaves it away though midwicket.
another short ball, Hyatt works it around through midwicket for a single.
legbreak from Ashwin. Hyatt takes it on the full and drives to long-on for a single.
too short to Bravo, he cracks it away into the covers for a single.

Parthiv has attempted a clever stumping, and the third umpire is being asked to check it. Tossed up and turning down the leg side, Hyatt can't get the glance away and keeps the foot grounded. Parthiv collects and waits. And waits. Until Hyatt lifts the foot. He does eventually, but brings it down almost immediately, before the bails are whipped off.
carrom ball on off and middle, breaking away as Hyatt spots it and defends.
back of a length, whipped with the turn through midwicket for one.
tossed up on the stumps, Bravo whips aerially on purpose and gets a single to deep midwicket.
flat ball on the stumps, Bravo drives to long-on for a single.
flatter and faster, the hotelier pushes it into the off side for one more.
Bravo backs away and looks to cut even as the ball spins in, and finds cover with his shot.
Hyatt works carefully through the leg side for two more.
looks to launch Jadeja out of the ground and mistimes the leg-side smash. It lands just short of long-on ...
well played! Bravo opens the face as Jadeja goes fractionally wide of off stump, and guides it down to third man. Feather-touch delicate stuff this.
flat ball turning into the pads, Hyatt nudges it round the corner for one.
Bravo is looking ominous now! Tossed up a touch wide of off stump, Bravo cleans it up through the covers off the front foot. Beats cover in the circle and wide long-off easily.

The hotel runs out of rooms. In fact the intercom has conked off. Hyatt is gone. Back of a length outside off, Bravo cuts it to deep point and they think of two. Hyatt ambled to the batting end and turned blind. Bravo was hollering a series of "No!"s from the bowler's end, he wasn't looking for the second at all once Vinay fired in a powerful throw. Hyatt hears him only when he is close enough to. Parthiv manages to collect and break the stumps, despite coming close to falling down in anticipatory glee.
flighted ball on the stumps, defends to the off side.
turning into the pads, Polly stays on the crease and defends to the leg side.
back of a length on the stumps, stays back and plays it through the off side.
tossed up on the stumps, Polly defends off the front foot.
leans out once more to defend a flighted ball.
Pollard skips out to get to the flight and whips powerfully through midwicket.
he's done it again, Bravo makes room and opens the face to steer with Jadeja's pace down to third man. The ball skidded off the face of the blade just as fast as it came on. Neat deflection.
tighter line, he leans forward and defends now.
flat ball on the pads, Pollard whips to midwicket.
on the pads again, Pollard works it through midwicket for one.
tight line, no room for Bravo to work with and he punches it back to the bowler.
A fine fifty for Bravo. Tossed up on the pads, he wrists it away sumptuously through midwicket.
flat ball on the pads, Pollard shuffles across and works it to square leg.
another flat delivery, defended back down the track.
fired across wide of the stumps, Bravo under-edges the cut.
fuller and slower, Bravo pushes softly into the covers for a single.
another flat delivery on Pollard's pads, and it is worked round the corner, but not into the gap.
short again, Pollard drives down to long-on for a single.
Bravo prances back to pull down the ground for one more.
slow and tossed up, Pollard defends from the crease.
Bravo leans out to to play Raina with the spin to cover.
beaten outside off by the sliding offbreak. Bravo was playing inside the line there. Parthiv gets excited.
works this one into the covers off the front foot.
short ball, Bravo hangs back and whips through midwicket.
on the pads, Pollard turns it straight to midwicket.
Polly skips out and chips with the angle to midwicket for one.
flat from Rohit, Pollard drags it away through midwicket for one.
short ball, Bravo hacks it through the covers for a single. Aaron fumbles and they think of a second, but decide against it.
another flat ball, muscled down to long-on for another single.
short ball on middle and off, Bravo defends to the off side.
hint of width outside off, Bravo creams it away through point for a single.
Pollard stays stuck to the crease and works with the angle through square leg for one.
short of a length again, pushed down the ground for another single.
good milking session this for the Windies. India happy to give the singles. Bravo leans out and defends softly into the covers.
on Polly's pads and he turns it square for yet another single.
Bravo laces a length ball into the covers for one more.
another single taken, Pollard works through the leg side again.
six singles in that over. Bravo tips into the covers and runs.
angled in from wide of the crease, Bravo pushes it back to the bowler.
width now, enough for Bravo to glide down past backward point for a single.
well bowled... nearly has Pollard in a mess there as he holds the length back and defeats Pollard in the air. He ends up feeling for it from the crease and it nearly sneaks through onto the stumps.
flatter and faster, he manages to keep it out.
again attacks the stumps, Pollard stays on the crease and defends without conviction. The ball dribbles into the off side.
tossed up to end the over, Pollard defends off the front foot. Drinks for the second time today.
tossed up on the stumps, he leans out and defends to the off side.

Bravo escapes another caught and bowled chance. He hangs on the crease and thumps a length ball right back at Raina, it came back straight at him and Raina got the hands in a good position as he fell back but couldn't grab on.
Pollard jumps out, gets close to the pitch and hoicks to midwicket for one.

bowled him! Raina's quicker one - 94 kph - does the trick. It landed on off, but didn't turn away like the other deliveries. It just skidded on as Bravo drove loosely away from the body. The ball slipped past the inner half of the bat and hit off stump. End of a very good innings, just before the Powerplay too.
flat ball to welcome him, Ramdin defends from the crease.

haha! Raina gets wrong-footed by Ramdin's drive. He was moving to the right in anticipation, but the ball passed to his left for a single down the ground. Whoa, a misfield at long-off, and they get another run.
fires this one into the pad as Pollard looks to advance, but Jadeja keeps it flat and scrambles the shot.
stops in his tracks to see what Pollard is up to before landing it back of a length on middle and leg. Pollard can't do much with it.
three dots in the Powerplay to a man who is known to butcher sixes. Follows him again with a flat straighter one and Pollard can't do anything with it as he tries to heave to the leg side.
finally gets a single away, desperately dragging it down the ground.
full ball on the stumps, Ramdin leans out to defend off the front foot.
whoa, how close was that? Ramdin tries to cut an armer that slips close to the off stump as he misses. Very close.
offbreak on the pads, Pollard nudges down to square leg for one.
the floater outside off, Ramdin tries to cut and misses as it drifts along.
proper offbreak now, Ramdin adjusts and works a single with the spin through square leg.
another floater. Or was it the carrom ball? Pollard stays pinned on the crease and spots it late to defend to point.
Pollard's woes against spin continue. Ashwin strikes. Short of a length and spinning in, Pollard stays back and tries to hoist it out of the ground, but picks out long-on. Horrible stroke.
another legbreak from Ashwin, but he slips this well down the leg side.
dipping offbreak to end the over, Sammy dabs it from the crease to the leg side.
full and fast outside off, Ramdin gets forward and defends to the off side.
flat and quick again, Ramdin defends without scoring intent.
slips onto the pads, Ramdin gets the single now into the midwicket.
too straight to Sammy who looks to nurdle from inside the line and gets a single to square leg.
Ramdin defends softly into the covers for another single before Aaron can run in.
loopy and breaking in, gets Ramdin to work across the line and get a leading edge that pops up safely into the covers.
turns into the pads, and Ramdin gets a single through square leg.
floater outside off, Sammy doesn't spot it and gropes for it inside the line.
whoa, close. Would have been a strange way to get out. Sammy closes the face early on a regulation tuck around the corner and the leading edge nearly carries to mid-on.
extra bounce along with spin from outside off, Sammy defends it cautiously as if Ashwin's hurled a grenade at him.
stays back and forces against the spin into the covers. Still can't get the single away.
Jadeja drifts this in towards the pads and Ramdin defends from the crease.
angled into the pads, allows Ramdin to turn it around through the leg side for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, defended off the front foot.
opens the face and guides a single through point.
looped up outside off, Ramdin smashes the drive into the covers but there's protection there.
a dawdle of a Powerplay comes to an end. It has done infinite damage to the WI cause. Turned around to square leg with the turn.
Ashwin slips another floater outside off, past the outside edge.
tossed up generously on the stumps, Ramdin plays it to midwicket but can't get the single.
looped up outside off, Ramdin gets forward and plays it to mid-on again.
goes outside off, Ramdin steers it square through the off side.
drives inside out now, but once again finds cover.
after protecting Sammy for five balls, he gets the single now. Gets the drive past the cover fieldsman now.
fired in short of a length, Ramdin pops it uppishly over the bowler for a single.
on the off stump, Sammy is very circumspect as he looks to cover the line. Defended to the off side.

Gone. Jadeja's turn to slip in the arm ball past a confused West Indies batsmen with neither the footwork nor the eye to deal with such variations. Sammy doesn't cover the line, doesn't spot the deviation and just hangs the bat limply in hope for turn. He's haplessly outside the line, and the ball shoots through to strike timber.
outside edge now, but thick enough to go to the boundary. Russell pushes forward and looks to cover the line but ends up edging it with the turn through third man. First four in 13 overs.
defends off the front foot with a straight bat, back to the bowler.
Ramdin works a flighted ball from outside off with the turn.
carrom ball, Ramdin defends it back to the bowler.
slow and full outside off, Ramdin pushes softly into the off side for a quick single.
beats Russell in the flight as the ball dips and breaks towards the leg side, but Russell manages to inside edge the attempted whip through backward square leg.
backs away to a sharp offbreak and drives against the turn into the covers.

Russell gets another edged boundary through third man. This was very full from Ashwin, and Russell was looking to dig it out, but the edge flew away very fine. How good a spell this has been, from Ashwin.
full ball round-arm from wide of the stumps, defended back to the bowler.
slipping onto the pads, worked with the angle through square leg.
Russell leans out to defend a full ball.
another armer, Russell is more careful than Sammy and defends with bat and pad near each other.
Russell gets the single now, pushing hard through the mid-off area.
ends with another armer, Ramdin backs away and cuts as it keeps coming in, and manages to squeeze it away.
sharp ball to start off, angling in at pace as he looks to cut and for the nth time today, the batsman gets an inside edge to the leg side.

and gone. Yadav recovers nicely on his followthrough to run back towards the umpire and complete a return catch. Ramdin stayed back and was looking to swing to the leg side, but ends up getting a meek edge.
that's really quick! Looking to york Russell, who manages to adjust and defend at the l;ast moment.
Russell gets a single into the covers now. Over to Roach.
another attempted yorker, full and curving in. Roach defends off the front foot reasonably well.
hops across to cover the line and defend a short length ball to the off side.
slower ball, beats him all ends up as he looks to pull. he is done with the shot when the ball comes and thuds into his back and go behind point.
Roach again moves across to the off stump and defends a length ball to the off side.
fuller length and angling in menacingly, Roach inner edges through midwicket for a single.
over-pitched, and Russell muscles it with furious timing at mid-on. Jadeja collects and hurls at the bowler's end, but misses. Touch and go, it would have been.
another slower ball, Russell is sucked into a hard-handed drive behind point and it goes uppishly towards third man.

blasted away uppishly, but he nearly holes out to deep extra-cover. Aaron goes full and just outside off, Russell times the loft really well off the back foot, but it lands short of the man diving in from the deep.
another power drive through the covers against a pacy delivery. What is this man doing batting below pretenders like Sammy and Ramdin?!
bouncer from Umesh, Roach ducks under it quickly.
back of a length outside off, Roach covers the line and taps into the covers for one.
another heavy ball, dropped well short and past Russell's attempt to pull. Beaten for pace, and called a bouncer.
close to a wide that. Umesh goes wide of off stump as Russell backs away to carve, but he misses.

how did that go? Russell must be as confused as us that he got six for that. Slow legcutter from Umesh, Russell picked up the length early and looked to hoick it over the leg side, but the extra bounce meant he got a top edge. Despite the lack of pace on it, it carried comfortably over long-on.
Roach pushes a single into the covers now.
low full toss on the stumps, Russell lashes it away through midwicket for a single.
Roach again jumps across and opens his face to guide a single through point. The Windies have 200.

We have seen pace, we have seen spin and now we see lack of pace get a wicket. 115 kph from Aaron, he's delighted to have a wicket with that one. Russell spots it late and looks to force the cut away through point, but gets an inside edge onto him stumps, to leave Aaron grinning with glee.
full toss on the stumps, Martin the leggie manages to keep it out.
length ball outside off, Martin slaps it into the covers to open his account.
short of a length outside off, Martin hops and guides it down to third man for one.
Umesh goes full and fast in search of the lbw, and Roach gets across the stumps and manages to get the pad on it to the leg side. Surely slipping down the leg.
Martin does everything he can to get a single, hopping this way and that before working it down the track.
whoa, a slower ball but he didn't go for the offspinner or the legspinner. Just released it softly and got it to swing away gently too. Play and a miss.
back to normal service in the mid 140s, and it is defended.
Martin is pushed onto the back foot and defends a short ball on the jump to the off side.
114 kph from Aaron, it stays low and slips under Roach's attempt to heave to the leg side.
not good for the toes. Full and curving in towards the pads, Roach is caught on the crease as he looks to work it to the leg side and limps across for the single.
short ball outside off, Martin clatters it away through extra cover for one.
poor ball, full toss angled down the leg side and Roach skips inside the line and rolls the wrists on it to send it away at the 86 mph at which it came. Ashwin at fine leg had no chance.
another slower ball, scoots along the turf as Roach backs away and tries to crash it through the off side.
and he ends the innings with another slower ball on the stumps, this time Roach spots it and nurdles round the corner for a couple of runs. West Indies finish on a fairly unflattering 211.

inn2.comm: Roach angles the first ball across Parthiv who leaves.
already a no-ball. India didn't bowl any. And a big one too. Parthiv stays beside the line and steers a single. A free-hit to Sehwag. What a nightmare! The crowd perks up.

Sehwag will be disappointed. He could not get a six. Short and wide of off stump, he backs away and cracks it in copyrighted style over backward point. One bounce and over the ropes, there wasn't enough pace on it to carry all the way.
play and miss as Sehwag stays planted on leg stump and lashes at a wide ball.
Roach slants this onto the pads and further down at 143 kph and the ball keeps swinging down the leg side. The keeper can't get around to stop it.
threads the covers now. Ominous timing on that marginally on-the-up drive through the covers. Pollard hurries back to tag it.
goes on the other side of cover now. Back of a length outside off, Sehwag stands tall and steers beautifully as it comes along beside him.
that's the length you should use against Sehwag. Short ball, angling in and cramping him. Sehwag looks to fend but can't get it away.
tossed up on the stumps, Parthiv can't get it away.
this one slips down the leg side, past the attempted sweep.
back of a length and loose two-finger spin on it. Parthiv defends off the front foot.
top-edges the sweep, but there's no one at deep backward square leg. Tossed up and spinning down the leg side, Parthiv looks to hoick and manages to find vacant space for the mis-hit.
flatter length, Parthiv covers the line and defends.
full length on the stumps and Parthiv bottom-hands the on-drive for a single.
flat delivery to end the over, and it is forced from the crease through mid-on for one.
back of a length from Roach and at good pace. Cramping Sehwag for room too as he looks to force it square, and it goes off an inside edge to the leg side.
this one slips onto the pads, and Sehwag is as good as any on that line. Worked through square leg for a couple.
tucks Parthiv up on the crease with a length ball, he covers the line and defends.
width this time, Parthiv stays on the crease and guides fluently through cover, but finds the fielder.
short of a length outside off, Parthiv opens the face and guides it behind point for a single.
good rising short ball, Sehwag hops and defends off the top end of the bat.
these are strange lines from Martin. Tossed up on leg and turning down the leg side, Parthiv lashes the sweep away through the still vacant deep square leg area for four.
flatter length, Parthiv stays back and forces it through mid-on for one.
Sehwag backs away and Martin follows him with a non-spinner. Sehwag still tries to go through the off side, but finds cover.
tossed up now, Sehwag leans forward and smashes it right back at the bowler, but it bounces well short of him.
Width outside off, the new ball fairly flies off Sehwag's blade as he stays fixed on leg stump and crashes it away with a cut shot. Spin isn't working.
glorious. Sehwag leans out to reach the flight and butchers this inside out past wide mif-off for four more. India are racing away here.

Parthiv wastes yet another chance to make an impression. When will he take his batting seriously? Short and wide outside off, it was there for the smashing, but Parthiv doesn't bother to keep it down. Cut with delicious timing, but straight to point.
short ball from over the stumps, tucks up Gambhir on the crease as he hops and defends.
Gambhir's away with four now, unlike Parthiv he goes well over the infield. Short and wide, he stays beside the line and slaps it up and over.

Two in the over, Gambhir gone now! Again short, again wide, again Gambhir tries to cut over the top, but this time it bounces extra and takes a thin edge, straight into the keeper's gloves. If Sehwag is worried, he isn't showing it. He walks across to umpire Tarapore and has a smile and a chat about the dismissal.
welcomes him with a bouncer, but it is angled marginally down the leg side as Kohli ducks. Called a wide.
another brisk short ball, Kohli stands tall and forces it down.
back of a length outside off, Kohli opens the face and defends to point.
oh boy, another no-ball. Sehwag will be eager to get the two extra runs out of the free-hit now. Back of a length, punched from the crease to mid-on.
No six, no four, in fact, no runs. Full length ball outside off, Sehwag tries to blaze it through the covers but mistimes it and finds mid-off.
back of a length, and on and around off stump. Sehwag stays on the crease and defends to mid-on.
whoa, beaten outside off. Russell squares him up with movement off the seam, Sehwag chases it and misses. Quite close to the edge ...
pitched up on the stumps, Sehwag drives to mid-on for a single.
short to Kohli, Russell's pace of 85 mph is not a problem for him. He pulls it down to deep square leg for a single.

back of a length outside off, Sehwag guides it to point and looks on. Kohli runs halfway down and then has to turn and hurry back. The throw is wide alright, and Kohli looks to protect himself from the throw instead of get in early.
lovely timing from Kohli. Roach bends this in towards middle and leg, Kohli gets the front foot across and whips it with a roll of the wrists through midwicket.
back of a length outside off, Kohli defends from the crease towards point.

Roach strikes again, Kohli is gone and we have a match on our hands! Roach nips this one in off the seam, Kohli gets across in a lazy manner without getting bat and pad close together and the ball darts through before he can drag the bat back in. It bounced a bit more too after hitting the seam to hit the top of the stumps. Kohli looks stunned.
pacy and angling in, Rohit stays back and plays it to the leg side.
squares him up, Roach gets the ball to go the other way now and take an outside edge through point for one.
back of a length, deliciously quick and it bursts in towards Sehwag who hops and jabs in a hurry to the off side.
full ball from Russell, angling in towards the pads and Rohit works it through midwicket.
whoa, huge inducker this, it veered in drastically towards Sehwag and hit him on the pad before hitting the inside edge and going to the leg side.
gets the single now, getting inside the line and dabbing square for a single.
angled in towards Rohit's pads, he consciously keeps the on-drive down towards midwicket.
back of a length outside off, Rohit hops and steers to point.
fuller length this time, Rohit gets forward confidently and drives towards mid-off.
short ball angled in towards Sehwag who hops and defends to the leg side.
cuts in at pace once again, this is the perfect line for Sehwag as he stays on the crease and tries to work it square.
bouncer now, Sehwag ducks under it quickly.

trouble, but Rohit is safe in the end. Full length ball outside off, Sehwag drives to cover where Martin fumbles and they decide to run on the misfield. Rohit makes it, but a direct hit may have made the difference.
back of a length outside off, Sehwag stays beside the line and defends to the off side with an angled face.
short ball outside off, defended from the crease cautiously.
short ball tucks Sehwag up on the crease again and he defends on the hop.
short ball just outside off, Sehwag is again pushed back in the crease as he defends.

Timber! Sehwag is gone now, bowled through the gate. He goes for a loose drive to a length ball nipping in off the seam prodigiously. He hasn't had many chances to come forward, and when he did, he was very loose, pushing well away from the body. The ball slips through easily and hits the stumps. Kohli was at least trying to close the gap, Sehwag was just opening it further and further. India in dire straits.
short ball on the leg stump line, Raina tucks it square for a single.
flowing drive through the off side as Russell pitches it up, but mid-off dives away to cut it off.
aimed at Raina's ribs again, but he is adept at hopping and nudging to the leg side. A misfield allows these two hares to scamper back.
back of a length and going away off the seam, worked off a thick outside edge through backward point.
on length to Raina, who covers the line and plays it back to the bowler.
angled across Raina, who adjusts and guides through cover for a single.
Rohit opens the face and steers through point for one more.
Raina stays back and opens the face to guide a ball angling across towards deep point.
Rohit feels for a length ball outside off and misses ...
Raina gets behind the line and defends solidly.

Raina gone, and West Indies are favourites to win this now. He was hopelessly early on a shot now. 137 kph, full ball outside off, Raina leans out early and scoops the drive straight to mid-on. That dismissal was softer than a baby's bottom.
short ball outside off, Jadeja rises and defends to the point area.
short of a length outside off, Jadeja defends to the off side again.
short ball, bends his back and sends this down at 136 kph, and Jadeja lets it go.
short and wide, Jadeja responds with a cut but plays it straight to point.
wide ball to Rohit, he lets it through to the keeper.
back of a length outside off, Rohit defends to the off side.
gets the single this time, pushing into the covers from the crease.
probing length from Sammy, defended off the front foot.
Jadeja looks to force down the ground, but gets a thick inside edge through square leg for a couple.
back of a length on off stump, defended to the leg side.
full ball on the stumps, Jadeja digs it out towards mid-on.
short ball, Jadeja unfurls a good-looking pull shot but finds midwicket.
back of a length on the stumps, worked with the wrists towards mid-on.
back of a length at 130 kph and it got big on Jadeja, but he handled it well to steer behind square for one.
short of a length outside off, Rohit guides towards point from the crease.
soft hands from Rohit, he drops a length ball into the off side and they sprint across for a single.
length ball angling into Rohit, who nudges a single into the midwicket area.
full ball on off stump, Jadeja gets confidently forward to drive to mid-off.
over-pitched generously wide of off stump. Jadeja creams it through the covers for a single.
outside edge again, Rohit drives loosely away from the body and it lands well short of gully.
gets the meat of the bat this time with a punch into the covers.
Jadeja opens the face to steer another single through the cover-point.
turns away from a length outside off, Jadeja leaves.
Jaddu leaves again as it turns away outside off.
looks to chop this away square, and it goes on the bounce to slip/
full ball on the stumps, Jadeja leans out and defends gingerly to the leg side.
full ball outside off, Jadeja guides it into the covers.
short ball, Jadeja cuts it straight to point and they get a single.
short of a length on off stump, Jadeja defends as he rises towards point.
beaten outside off now as Sammy slips this through at slightly extra pace.
short of a length again, Jadeja pushes through point and gets a single.
short ball at 126 kph, sits up laboriously and makes it tough for Rohit to drag the pull down. He gets it away to deep midwicket for a single.
over-pitched wide of the stumps, Jadeja opens the face as he drives away from the body and gets a single.
angled into the pads, Rohit capitalises with a neat flick through backward square leg. Boundary after a while, the crowd doesn't mind the release.
short from Samuels, it is cut away square for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, driven off the front foot to mid-on.
leading edge as Rohit over-estimates Samuels' spin and gets it away through point.
flighted on off stump, Jadeja leans out and defends back to the bowler.
over-pitched outside off, and Jadeja drives down the ground to long-off.
flighted on the stumps, Rohit leans out to defend off the front foot.
length ball on middle and leg stump, played from the crease to mid-on.
short of a length, Jadeja hops and taps to the leg side for a single.
short of a length, Rohit opens the face and dabs it to point.
Rohit elegantly opens the face to steer a single to third man. Another no-ball.
That's one way to escape with free-hits, even if momentarily. Slips this one three yards wide of off stump and it is called.
short ball, Jadeja muscles it away through midwicket and scampers back for two.
short ball on the hips, he skips and nudges awrily towards square leg for one.
short and pacy outside off, Rohit looks to cut, but the width isn't quite there.
tossed up wide of off stump, defended off the front foot.
tossed up outside off, and Jadeja tries to Laxman it through midwicket. But he isn't VVS. Mistimed to midwicket.
back of a length and straightening outside off, Jadeja tries to hang back and defend to the off side.
angling in from wide of the crease, Jadeja doesn't have enough room to work with.
now he slides onto the pads, and Jadeja works it through square leg for a couple.
sliding down onto the pads, Rohit works it off the inner half of the blade through square leg.
short ball, Jadeja punches it down the ground for one.
tossed up and gone! Martin flights this into the zone, Rohit leans out languidly and launches this into stratosphere. Stunning bit of timing on that pick-up shot.
shortens the length, and Rohit pushes a single through the off side.
tossed up to Jadeja, he plays it back to the bowler.
flatter this time, Jadeja whips it through midwicket.
back of a length outside off, Rohit punches it back to the bowler.
angled into the pads, Rohit turns it around for a single.
turning away from outside off, Jadeja dabs it square but can't beat point.
inside edged but safe as Samuels spears this in with the arm and Jadeja plays for turn. Single taken towards fine leg. 100 is up.
pitched up on the stumps, Rohit drives it down to long-off and gets another single.
slower ball on the pads, Rohit gets some pad on it and gets a leg-bye.
Jadeja again cuts hard but can't beat point. Pollard parries it away and they get a single.
angled in from wide of the crease, Rohit defends with bat and pad close together.
Rohit times the back foot punch well, but finds cover.

good effort eventually after making a hash of a regulation stop. Short ball to Rohit, he guides the pull well in front of square and Barath has to hurry across from deep square leg to stop it. He slides, but lets the ball slip through. And then as it slips close to the fence, he jumps back and pulls it in to deny the four.
full-pitched on off stump, Jadeja drives solidly to long-off for one.
back of a length on the pads, Jadeja nudges through the midwicket area for one.
fired in full outside the off stump, Rohit drives to cover.
the 50 stand is up as Samuels fires one wide down the leg side.
flat ball outside off, forced down the ground for a single.
fuller ball outside off, Jadeja leans out and defends to point.
appeal for lbw as Samuels pushes this through. Jadeja was looking to play across the line again, but I think his pad was just outside the line of off stump. Tell you what, that was really close ...
very wide of off stump, Jadeja tries to chop it away but only bottom-edges it to nowhere.
short ball outside off, mistimes the cut does Rohit.
gorgeous from Rohit. Leans forward almost reluctant to punish the ball, and slots it through extra cover with a smooth working of the hands. The ball almost feels grateful to be treated that way.
angled into the pads, Rohit chips it square and hurries back for two more.

and he smashes another four now. Rohit is shifting gears here. Short ball outside off, Rohit slams the pull down square and rolls the wrists on it to send the ball packing. Deep midwicket is reduced to fetching duties.
better length, and that keeps low too. Rohit adjusts and defends from the crease.
back of a length on the stumps, defends to the leg side.
too short to Jadeja, another pull guided to the deep for a couple. The Windies need a wicket soon.
this one holds its line as Jadeja pushes forward to defend.
fired down the leg side, Jadeja tries to glance and gets some pad on it down to fine leg.
back of a length and turning in, Rohit defends it back from the crease.
fired in at 120 kph - Afridi is the only spinner who can bowl faster than that. Rohit scoops it back to the bowler, it drops just short.
Rohit gets a single now into the covers to end the over.
full ball floated on off stump, Rohit drives it through mid-off.
ooh this one stops on Jadeja as he tries to whips it, and it pops up to the left of Pollard as he moves across in search of a return catch.
slips this well wide of off stump and it is called.
Jadeja gets a boundary away, and it is a lovely stroke too. Width from Pollard, Jadeja opens the face and slithers it away backward of point. Deep third man had no chance.
angled wide of Jadeja, who lets it go to the keeper.
length ball outside off, Jadeja opens the face and steers it to point. They want a single, but decide against it.
width well outside off, Jadeja cuts it down to third man for another single. Runs are coming too easily.
four more. Jadeja gets width outside off once again and unfurls a dainty little cut through backward point for another boundary.
dangled temptingly outside off, Jadeja lets it go through to the keeper.
fuller ball on the toes, driven down to long-on for a single.
Rohit opens the face to a full ball on off stump and picks up a single through point.
short delivery outside off and Jadeja cuts straight to point.
he's getting better and better now. Lesser room outside off this time than on the last occasion, but Jadeja manages to generate enough power on the steer and finds the gap square too.
Pollard wafts it away short of a length outside off and Rohit cuts gently towards point.
gets the single now, working one off the pads towards midwicket.
Jadeja has thrown it away, and West Indies are right back in this. Full and wide of off stump, he goes at it without getting entirely across and ends up slashing uppishly straight to point.
shortish ball outside off, that one is left alone
another short ball, sits up just outside off, guided down to third man for a single
short of length and just outside off, tapped it to the off side to end the over
slides that down the leg side
pushed towards cover for a single
pitched up and outside off, driven along the ground towards extra cover
full and quick outside off, squeezed towards backward point for a single
length ball that holds its line outside off, batsman was playing for the turn, outside-edge towards the off side
punched towards long-on for a single
ooh, that was close, looking to drive off the front foot towards the off side, gets a thick inside-edge that just misses the stumps
bowled from wide of the crease, the angle increases but he then fires it far down the leg side, the 150 comes up
length ball outside off, eased towards cover off the front foot
short of length and just outside off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off
length ball slanting into the pads, clipped behind square to get to his half-century
bowled from wide of the crease again, played a touch uppishly towards extra cover, that was slightly slower from Pollard
short and wide, slashed towards deep point for a single
slow legroller outside off, Ashwin guides it into the covers for one.
offcutter wide of off stump, Rohit forces it to long-off for a single.
back of a length outside off, Ashwin opens the face and guides to point.
short ball aimed at the ribs, but not fast enough to trouble Ashwin who drops it to the leg side.

deja vu for Ashwin! Disaster! Slow offcutter outside off, Rohit cut it to the deep and was always coming back for the second run. He was running to the danger end. It is Rohit's call, Ashwin kept saying no, but Rohit was halfway back and kept running. Ashwin eventually took off for the second, and like the other day, he started hopelessly late. The keeper has enough time to collect and relay it to the bowler.
wide of off stump, Rohit square drives to deep point for a single. He is happy with the single this time.
full ball angled in, Rohit leaned out and worked it to mid-on.
full again, played off the front foot through the leg side.
back of a length from Polly, Vinay defends carefully from the crease.
width outside off, defended towards point.
Vinay gets a boundary that gives the crowd something to cheer. Wide of off stump, he reaches across and nurdles at it, and manages to get a thick edge wide of the keeper.
slow offcutter, Vinay quietly drops it to the leg side for a single.
slipping down the leg side, Vinay tries to tickle it fine but only finds the keeper.
back of a length outside off, Vinay stays back and defends to the off side.
tries to turn the wrists on a length ball angling down the leg side, but gets it away squarer rather than fine.
width outside off, Vinay again potters across and opens thew face. A fumble at third man allows Vinay to hurry back for the second.
on Vinay's pads, he works it to square leg and there's a needless throw that misses. Words being exchanged between Rohit and Bravo. A slip comes in.
short ball outside off, good pace and bounce on it. Vinay stays out of the way.
low full toss outside off, Rohit plays it to cover for a single.
fuller length to Vinay, he leans out confidently and drives into the covers.
full ball angling in towards the pads. Vinay on-drives uppishly to mid-on.
floats this well wide of off stump and Vinay lets it go.
another one quite wide of off stump, with men prowling in the covers. Vinay cuts straight to one of them.
slower ball to end the over, very full and in the blockhole. Vinay plays it out to the off side, but can't get the single.
full length ball outside off, driven fluidly but he finds cover.
short of a length, ominous timing once again, but he finds cover.
lots of width outside off and Rohit smokes it between point and cover. There's protection in the deep, though.
full length ball to Vinay, who defends adequately to cover.
bouncer, Vinay has no clue where it is and ducks away as he takes his eyes off. He ends up getting it away off the handle towards third man. Uppish but safe. Clumsy as they come!
nervy moment. Full and wide of off stump, Rohit inside edges an attempted dab and it bounces close to the stumps.
Vinay has another needless flirt with a short ball well outside off. He needs to calm down, the run rate isn't a worry here. He misses this one.
good bouncer, Vinay ducks under this quickly and stays out of harm's way.
full ball outside off, Vinay leans out and opens the face to steer it square.
still can't find the single, Vinay times the push well but finds cover now.
lets this one go through outside off.
length ball dips in towards the pads and Vinay defends it to the leg side.
Roach presses this down the leg side and India get a run and a ball.
full and wide of off stump, Vinay goes for the million-dollar cover drive and misses. He's looking quite edgy out there.
slower ball, stays low as Rohit plays from the crease and he edges it onto his pad.
over-pitched on the pads, and Rohit works it straight to mid-on.
length ball on off stump, Rohit plays it back to the left of the bowler, and Russell tumbles and parries it to mid-off.
on the pads, the single is taken with a turn to the leg side. Two balls for Vinay to handle now.
near yorker on middle and leg, Vinay digs it out towards mid-on.
another bouncer slides down the leg side and it is called a wide. West Indies have been generous with the extras.
legcutter banged in short, Vinay rises with it and plays it down towards gully.

brainfade from Rohit! Brainfade from Bravo! Or was it just fading light? Rohit escapes after playing a horrible stroke. The dot-ball glut gets to him and he tries to swing a short ball over the leg side. The length wasn't there, the balance wasn't there and he got a top edge that was flying away towards third man. Bravo just froze. He needed to come a few yards forward and catch it, but didn't move. He didn't pick it!
full toss outside off and Vinay gets a single at long last into the covers.
this is atrocious from the Windies. Another no-ball. Rohit is going to wind up for the free-hit, after defending the no-ball to the leg side.
can't capitalise on it. He backs away to the leg side, Roach puts it well wide of off and Rohit can only dig it out towards cover for a single.

well played, Vinay. Short and wide outside off, he steers it to third man and was always coming back for the second. He charged back and dived in to ensure he was in. He needn't have - the throw was wide.
on the pads now, Vinay tucks it delicately through midwicket for a single.
Rohit rises with a short ball and defends towards point.
on the pads, Vinay turns it round the corner for a single.
tossed up on the pads, Vinay milks another single with a quiet dab to square leg.
flat ball outside off, Rohit forces it into the covers off the back foot.
tossed up this time, Rohit reaches forward and drives to long-off for one more.
Vinay pushes to point off the back foot and says a firm no for the single. He is looking a lot more at ease now.
short of a length outside Rohit's off stump and he angles the face to get another single through point.
back of a length outside off, Vinay opens the face and steers to point.
short and wide of off stump, Vinay lets it go to the keeper.
that one kept low, Vinay crouches low the way Tendulkar does when a ball shoots along and is on his haunches after keeping it out.
on the pads to end the over, Vinay turns it around square for a single.
turning in, worked with the angle to square leg.
short of a length, driven past the bowler for a single.
full length outside off, Rohit digs it out and plays it to the off side.
nearly pops a return catch! That stopped on Rohit, and he seemed early on the forward lunge and block. It landed just short of the bowler.
gets the single now, working the ball with the turn through square leg.
fired in full on the pads, defended off the front foot back down the track.
length ball outside off, Rohit punches it on the rise towards mid-off.
slow slower ball, Rohit waits and forces it down to long-on for one.
length offering to Vinay, he easily guides it to point.
again on a length, Vinay drives it fluently to mid-off.
another short ball at 75 mph, and it is enough to harry Vinay for pace. Poor technique again, he looks away and fends with the gloves, but manages to keep it out.
negotiates this one better, stays back and defends to the off side.
tossed up wide of off stump, Rohit reaches across and drives through the covers for a single.
back of a length, Vinay forces it to the left of the bowler but not for runs.
fuller ball this time, Vinay defends to the off side.
gets the single at long last. Slow and loopy outside off, driven past the bowler and Vinay was always going for it. The mid-on fielder went for his end, which didn't help. He missed it, all the same.
Rohit gets a couple away with splendid wrist work, opening the face on a ball that was full and on middle stump. Squeezed away through cover-point and he canters back. India are taking this away.
works this one the other way - from outside off towards mid-on for another single.
Sammy sends down a slower ball ....... Ok, now it reaches Rohit and he misses an attempted drive into the covers.
full length outside off, guided with an opened face towards point.
perfects the cover drive now, crashing a full ball through the covers for two. The crowd's not really been entertained today, but it looks like they will get the result they want.
full length again, Rohit drives to long-off for a single.
back of a length outside off, defended to the point area for a single. India have 200.
full ball on the off stump line, worked through mid-on for a single
that stopped on Rohit, he works it to the leg side and nearly pops it to midwicket.

Wicket! West Indies thought the match was past their reach, but is it? They are favourites now. Rohit has gone, playing all over a straight ball from Martin that somehow finds its way onto the stumps. It didn't turn, it just slipped along and missed Rohit's flick, hit the pad and changed direction to hit the stumps. He throws his head back in frustration as he walks back. India need 11 now and have only the fast bowlers left.
another slider that holds its line, Aaron nudges it to the leg side.
fuller this time, Aaron leans out and plays with more calm.
he nearly does a Rohit now, but manages to stop the ball before it goes onto the stumps.
maiden wicket at this time of the day! Aaron defends a full ball cautiously.

brainfreeze! Vinay has thrown it away. Is this his Srinath moment? Full length ball outside off, he decides to take matters into his own hand and tries to launch this over the off side. He can't quite get under it, and scoops it to mid-off who tumbles and pouches. Vinay looks gutted. The other fast bowler from Karnataka used to play such madcap shots too.
his technique doesn't look very promising. Keeps the front pad planted and pokes out to defend to the off side.
back of a length and angling in, Umesh hops and defends to the leg side.
Umesh keeps out a full ball to the leg side.
attempts to take a single as he works a ball to fine leg. Aaron refuses the single! This is ridiculous! He can't bat. Umesh can't bat. And he turns down a single! The dressing room looks furious.
another full ball aimed at the pads, Umesh keeps it out to the leg side. Over to the senior batsman now.
full ball on off stump, Aaron manages to play it to cover and wants the single first ball, after refusing one off the 5th off the last over. Straight to the fielder, so no run this time.
tossed up on off, Aaron leans out and defends compactly.
stays back and steers a length ball straight to point. No single yet. Rohit looks distraught in the sidelines.
Aaron gets the single, jumps out and drives down to long-off for one.

Run out appeal, but Aaron is in. Umesh props his front foot across and makes himself prone for the lbw, but manages to get bat on it and work it down to fine leg. This time Aaron runs, and even wants a second. Umesh refused rightly, and Aaron just about managed to beat the direct hit.
full ball to end the over, Aaron plays it back to the bowler. Martin picks it up and makes as if to throw, Aaron is in his crease. Pressure on the youngsters!
Umesh gets the single again, gets the front foot across perilously and then manages to work it to the leg side for a single.

Aaron does his mighty best to make up for some hare-brained batting and running until now. What a time to get a boundary. Short and wide outside off, Aaron cracks it away behind square for four. The Indian team is delighted, Rohit can't bear the tension.

he's got away another run! Aaron hangs back and opens the face and steers in front of point for a single. There might have been a second too, but he slipped while turning. Dujon calls it a "Speed wobble". What a legend!

Is Courtney Walsh watching? Umesh lets one go outside off, and it reminds me of Walsh's superb leave against Gillespie in that epic Lara Test from 1999. Full length, just outside off, and he lets it go without chasing it.

India have somehow won a match that neither team seemed interested in winning! Umesh Yadav has slammed a four down the ground. What epic timing for a No. 11! Sammy pitched it up on the stumps, Umesh gets the front foot across and on-drives with a strong bottom hand. The field is in, it easily passes mid-on and rolls down the ground in slow motion before popping over the ropes. Umesh was beaming wildly as he ran across, he knew it immediately. He joins Aaron, the man who was shielding him from the strike sometime back, in a mid-pitch embrace. The tear-aways from India have somehow pulled their side home in a classic.
